title: RAAF Record. Newsreel No. 07
creator_credit: Stanley Brogden and Australia. Royal Australian Air Force. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: Cinemagazine newsreel includes the following: 1. The RAAF flight in the Antarctic use Canadian “Beaver” aircraft. 2. RAAF personnel are trained by firemen in Melbourne. 3. The Lockheed Hercules transport. 4. The “Jindivik” pilotless aircraft, designed and built in Australia, shown in flight at Woomera range.
